description:
VietSoftware International (often referred to as VSII), established in 2006, is one of the leading software outsourcing companies in Vietnam. Internationally, VSII has been a trusted supplier to IBM for many years.
For more information, please visit us at www.vsi-international.com

Although it may seem hard to believe, the number of mobile phones being used is approximately equal to the number of people on our planet. This means there is a huge market for mobile apps. Is your company doing all it can be take advantage of this tremendous opportunity?

The expert mobile app developers at Orient Software are fully prepared to guide you and your company every step of the way. Read on to learn about our experience developing apps for the iPhone, iPad, Android, BlackBerry, Windows Phone, and mobile web platforms.

location: Vietnam, Hồ Chí Minh, Ho Chi Minh City
description:
Sutrix Media builds web & mobile applications for digital agencies in US, Europe and APAC. We have long term partnerships with onshore digital agencies in USA, France, Australia, Denmark & Finland who continually sends projects for development. We offer our clients flexible engagement models that are billed on a project basis or as a retained dedicated team.

Our Mobile developers write native code for iOS, Android & Window Phone. We can develop for both phone and tablets in these platforms. We can also use cross-platform frameworks such as Phonegap for simple mobile applications.

Bac Ha Technology Co. Ltd. (BHTech) was established in 2002. The company has been focusing on software development of construction projects in domestic market for the first ten years.

In the summer of 2012, there was an opportunity to build up a team with a reliable partner based on a long-term relationship between the Chairmans of BHTech and VIANOVA. BHTech started with its on-going projects and the new one as team building service. This is a new idea in software-development service with foreigner customers.
In May 2013, BHTech drives forward to the software development service based on team building service and it turns to be a main strategy of the company. Our main customer is Vianova System Finland Oy. Additionally, BHTech has other customers from EU and US.
In the end of 2014, BHTech International and BHTech Mobile was established. It is a start of the BHTech Ecosystem.

location: Vietnam, Hồ Chí Minh, Ho Chi Minh City
description:
We are Verztec a leading ISO 9001:2008 Global Content Consulting Company. Verztec assists companies around the Globe to design, develop, localize and publish their global communication messages in over 100 languages across various channels.

Recently we have hired highly professional team of graphic designers, web, software and mobile application developers to be able to provide high quality, fast and long-term services to our existing and potential clients all over the World. In addition, we are highly experienced in any kinds of localization, such as software, mobile application and other types of multimedia.

Our rates for the above said products and services are more than reasonable, if compare with our competitors, but our quality and lead time will satisfied the most exacting customer due to our strict company’s policy and huge experience in cooperation with such big companies as: Google, Intel, IBM, Dell, HP, BMW, VOLVO, GM, P&G, Unilever, SONY, SAMSUNG, MasterCard and many

location: Vietnam, Hồ Chí Minh, Ho Chi Minh City
description:
Saigon Technology Software is a Vietnam software development company, established in 2010, located in center of Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
We focus on delivering the best and most cost-effective solutions to our clients in areas such as e-finance, e-business, healthcare, and media.
Combining proven expertise in technology, and domain expertise, we deliver a wide range of software outsourcing services that includes:

Custom Application Development
Software Outsourcing Services
Web Application Development
Mobile Application Development
Offshore Software Development

Saigon Technology Software has very strong expertise in ASP.NET, AngularJS, NodeJS, iOS, Android applications development.

Saigon Technology Software is specialized in providing professional Offshore Software Development & Software Development Outsourcing Services based on the Offshore Development Center .

location: Vietnam, Hồ Chí Minh, Ho Chi Minh City
description:
- With 50++ software engineers based in HCM City - Vietnam, we provide software services for enterprises in form of web development and mobile, especially with our strong expertise in healthcare, education, real estate and construction, retail and e-commerce.
- We are the youngest company in Vietnam certified CMMI level 3, an international quality management standard, among other 30 IT companies totally in Vietnam certified this standard (https://sas.cmmiinstitute.com/pars/pars.aspx - please filter by Vietnam)
- We are recommended by Gartner as a software company to partner with in Vietnam (based on the report: "Leading Offshore Services Locations in Asia/Pacific, 2015: Smaller Countries Gain Traction”)
- Just October last year, we had been awarded by VNITO (the biggest Vietnam IT Outsourcing Alliance, www.vnito.org) as one of the top 33 IT outsourcing companies in Vietnam that had outstanding performance in 2015.
- More than 50 successful projects in Netherlands, North America.

location: Vietnam, Hồ Chí Minh, Tân Bình
description: Founded since 2011 by young and passionate technologists. Beesight Soft has started by innovative passion "together makes perfect". Since the, Beesight Soft has been initially successful in providing high quality outsourcing services, creating reputation for many domestic and foreign enterprises. Beesight Soft will grow with continuous efforts to explore the needs and build the best solutions for your business within reasonable budget.

location: Vietnam, Hồ Chí Minh, Chí Hòa
description:

Our team has more than 40 members: developers, designers, business analysts, testers, client account managers and a network of experienced consultants to help you unleash your business with useful applications.
Our production house is located in district 10, Ho Chi Minh city, Vietnam.

location: Vietnam, Hồ Chí Minh, Ho Chi Minh City
description:

We build apps for startups and enterprises which ensure scalability, robustness and top-notch user experiences. We have built more than 300+ apps since 2011 for both web and mobile platforms varying over 10+ industries gives us the edge over our competition and a perfect product delivered to our clients

Vietnam’s Most Trusted App Developer and Tech Co-Founders. We make apps successful by providing more than just development. We help market, scale and improve your app idea, effectively acting as an extended CTO. Founded in 2009 by a small team of passionate, Savvycom now has a balanced blend of technology skills and domain knowledge of seasoned IT professionals, powered by passion for IT.

location: Vietnam, Hồ Chí Minh, Ho Chi Minh City
description:
TP&P Technology is a leading offshore IT service provider in Ho Chi Minh City, the Silicon Valley of Vietnam. TP&P provide specialized expertise across a broad range of services: Software development and IT infrastructure management, web and mobile app development service, and Business Solutions Consulting and deployment.

TP&P’s management group is among the most accomplished in the industry, who are former co-founders of leading IT corporates in Viet Nam.

We aim to build the most creative, dynamic and collaborate environment in which the employees are highly motivated by giving appropriated autonomy to innovate and apply into works at the most effective, efficient and professional manner.

Eastgate Software is an outsourcing software development company that builds custom business solutions and applications. Founded in November 2014 in Vietnam, company has high-qualified staff with 20+ year experiences in software development including web/mobile and desktop applications. Eastgate Software has offices in Vietnam, Germany and USA.

Customer satisfaction is our highest priority. Therefore, our German and US senior experts offer local consulting support for customers in Europe and US. We put our heart into each individual project, and truly believe that we can create successful technology solutions which perfectly fit to your business.

location: Vietnam, Hồ Chí Minh, Ða Kao
description: We are a leading software development company in Vietnam.  We build enterprise web apps, mobile apps, eCommerce, SaaS, VOIP system, UX/UI design for startups and large companies.

location: Vietnam, Hồ Chí Minh, Bình Thanh
description:
Siclo Mobile is the top qualified application development studio in Ho Chi Minh City, being established in both Vietnam and France and working internationally.
We code and design both professional websites and mobile applications ; our mission is to listen to our partners' ideas and shape them into fully functional digital products. We also share our expertise through various types of audits.

location: Vietnam, Hồ Chí Minh, Ða Kao
description: NNG is a team of talented developers, designers, and marketers located in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. Our company formed due to increasing demand and growth of the IT sector around the world and for the love of technology. Our company's founders are western educated and our clientele spans around the globe from North America, Europe, and to Asia.
HBLAB Co., Ltd. is an offshore company which has excellent staff and much experiences in various fields such as web system development, smartphone application development, AI solution development.

AgileTech is a quality outsourcing company specializing in Website/Mobile Apps, Blockchain services, AI – big data Services. Since 2015, we have become the technology partner for many startups in which millions of US dollars were invested.

With a talented team and a transparent working process, we are always ready to move forwards with you on the way to pursuing innovative ideas.

Enlab is a dedicated offshore software development company in Vietnam, one of the top-ranked countries in software outsourcing in the world. Our focus is to provide excellent custom enterprise solutions with top-notch quality in every Agile delivery.

Our technology stacks include: ASP.NET, WCF/WebAPI, ASP.NET Core, Python/Django, PHP, Laravel, StreamInsight, T-SQL Programming, SQL Server, MongoDB, ExtJS, Ext.NET, DevExpress, Telerik, Kendo UI, Angular, VueJS, HTML5, CSS3, Xamarin, Flutter, Azure, AWS.

We offer a wide range of services for enterprises, startups, IT consulting vendors, digital agencies across the sea: Web application development, Cross-platform app development in Xamarin and Flutter, Software customization and enhancement.

We have experience in different domains and industries like real estate, construction, education, data management, procurement, marketing, recruitment, and ERP.
